name: IDOLSTAR: Pocket Mutsumi
description:
The idol that will be with you anywhere!

Mutsumi Koizumi is the newest idol from PR012, as a promotion she got an app/program where you can be with her no matter what, you can listen, call or even receive messages from her.

The game features a phone system, a minigame called "2048" and many more features where you can interact with Mutsumi as the new "pocket idol".

This game is free, but if you donate $2 or more you can support my development and also get a small book called "IDOLSTAR: Mutsumi's Diary", where you can read her experience about becoming  an idol and meeting everyone.
